name: blekk box TV
tag_list: ecommerce, tv-commerce, online-video, iptv, internet-tv, ott, connected-tv, advertising
overview:
BLEKK BOX TV’s automated TV Commerce application creates through positive image and brand association unplanned purchasing intentions on a global scale.

Users are able to purchase from any online video content at any given moment what they have viewed, saving them time. The application prompts emotion driven eCommerce sales; minimising the loss of time between product and brand exposure and the purchase opportunity, hence removing principal obstacles for overall sales, but particularly online sales.

Essentially connected TV and online video viewers can watch any type of video content and buy “things” they see, either straight from the screen or a companion device in a simple effortless manner, completely processed by computers without any manual intervention.

bbTV enables all eCommerce merchants to sell their products via an unobtrusive manner to viewers; no banner Ads, no pre-, mid- or post-roll Ads and no interactive video Ads are used, preserving the quality of the content and the viewing experience.

The “things” proposed to the viewer are contextual to the video content, thus relevant to the viewer. Additionally the application integrates user behaviour to create personal advertising and shopping experiences.
